I'm a software engineer passionate about building elegant solutions to complex problems. With over a decade of experience spanning startups to enterprise, I specialize in crafting performant, user-centric applications.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new places, capturing moments through photography, or diving deep into the latest tech trends. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with the community.

> "The best way to predict the future is to create it." - Peter Drucker

careerTimeline.description: Leading frontend architecture and developer experience initiatives for a B2B SaaS platform serving 500K+ users.
highlights: Architected micro-frontend system reducing deployment time by 60%
Led team of 5 engineers delivering major product redesign

careerTimeline.description: Full-stack development for a real-time collaboration platform, from MVP to Series B.
highlights: Built real-time sync engine handling 10K concurrent connections
Reduced API response times by 40% through optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipeline cutting release cycles in half

careerTimeline.description: Developed responsive web applications for diverse clients across e-commerce, media, and fintech sectors.
highlights: Delivered 20+ client projects on time and within budget
Introduced component library reducing development time by 30%
Mentored 3 junior developers into mid-level roles

careerTimeline.description: Graduated with honors, focusing on software engineering and human-computer interaction.
highlights: Dean's List all semesters with 3.8 GPA
Led university hackathon team to regional finals
Published research on UI accessibility patterns
